long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EzLink is a Chrome extension for Salesforce that provides a right-click menu in Chrome with frequently used related list links so that Salesforce users can open account-related information instantly without having to scroll many pages.

How to use:
1. Set your preference using EzLink Option: Right-click on the EzLink icon near the top right side of your Chrome browser and select Option. Then, use the options page to add/remove/rearrange the list of links.
2. In the Salesforce interface, right-click on an account link, such as in a list view or an account lookup field. 
3. Or right-click from an account record page on an empty area or over an area that is not a link.
4. Go to Org62 EzLink in the right-click menu and select one of the links.
5. EzLink also works with other objects with the same related list, such as from Contact to Case and Contact to Opportunity.

Disclaimer:
- This extension has been reviewed and approved by the Salesforce Application Security team.
- This extension does not change your Chrome or Org62 settings, does not call any API, and does not collect any information from your browser or computer.

Note for Salesforce Console users: another Chrome extension that works great together with EzLink is Lightning Console Extension. In addition, many EzLink shortcuts can be opened as a console tab when installed and enabled.

If Org62 EzLink menu reset, go to the options page again and click Reload Preference or re-configure your preference.

Some of the supported links:
Org62 Search
EWS360
Cases
Contacts
Opportunities
App Installed
Activity History
Asset Line Items
Service Entitlement
Program Engagements
Consumed Accel. Report
and more
